title: Celebrity Hometowns with Paul Holes
description: For a special treat, Karen and Georgia sit down with celebrity guests to hear their stories, from hometown murders to personal accounts of mayhem to legendary family lore. Today's guest is Paul Holes.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
